title: ConvertXtoDVD v5.0.0.73 [BETA] + Patch.rar
description:
Includes the VSO ConvertXtoDVD v5.0.0.73 BETA installation package, a patch and a text file containing instructions.

Install as usual. After installation use the provided patch. No serial number required. Done! Enjoy!


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Convert videos to DVD and watch on any DVD player. Automatically burn to DVD after conversion. Excellent and fast converter.

Convert AVI, MKV, MOV, Divx, WMV, MTS/M2TS, MPG, MP4 and more to DVD.

Create menus & chapters, cut videos, total customization with live preview.


Edit your project with the various settings and features listed below:
  -Create menus with videos and music
  -Preview window / Integrated video player for live preview
  -Cut unwanted parts of the video
  -Add chapters - automatic or custom
  -Many subtitles formats supported, convert soft or hard-coded
  -Convert NTSC to PAL and vice-versa
  -Merge function - like for CD1 + CD2
  -Rotate video, modify brightness and contrast settings
  -Compatible with any disks
  -ISO output available
  -NTSC + PAL region formats
  -16:9 widescreen + 4:3 fullscreen
  -Burn multiple copies
  -VSO burning engine included
  -Various SD resolutions available
  -Custom output size
  -Burn to DVD/USB key or store on PC

Additional/Advanced features:
  -2 pass encoding for enhanced quality
  -Hardware decoding for faster conversion
  -Video/Audio/Subtitle synchronisation
  -Various audio output formats
  -Image resize filters (lanczos, linear, cubic, etc.)
  -Multiple encoding profiles
  -Option to shutdown computer when finished
  -Multi-core processor optimized
  -Audio amplifier
  -Padding and cropping
  -De-interlacing
  -Batch converter
  -Multiple conversions processed simultaneously
  -Quality advisor

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WHY UPGRADE?

- 0006892: [Bug] No video with PhotoStory1.wmv or PhotoStory2.wmv (felicia) - resolved.
- 0006890: [Bug] Issue with ALAC and APE audio codecs (wesson) - resolved.
- 0006887: [Bug] overlapping in chapter tab (felicia) - resolved.
- 0006886: [Bug] No sound in menus (wesson) - resolved.
- 0006885: [Bug] Selecting Automatic for TV format during installation progress does not have any effects (felicia) - resolved.
- 0006879: [Bug] Program version not always showing on form caption (felicia) - resolved.
- 0006157: [Bug] cant minimize app during conversion (felicia) - resolved.
- 0006184: [Bug] Out Of System Resources message when removing several input files... (felicia) - resolved.
- 0006258: [Bug] .32 scroll bars on fresh install (felicia) - resolved.
- 0006063: [Feature Request] Could we see nice arrows for the streams in the Hint Bubble and in the ASCII Log file... (cedric) - resolved.
- 0006268: [Bug] wrong language identifier displayed (cedric) - resolved.
- 0006347: [Bug] unable to set starting time of video background in title menu with Black mirrors template (felicia) - resolved.
